original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.20. Vedanāttika, Kusalattika
analyzed: vedanā attika kusala attika

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhamma

original: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhamma

original: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … dve. (Cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā dve cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa. (Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: hetuyā cuddasa pe avigate cuddasa vipākam natthi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na akusalam dhamma

original: paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa vipākam natthi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare terasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, kamme sattarasa, natthiyā vigate terasa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe cuddasa adhipatiyā dvādasa anantare terasa upanissaye ekavīsa kamme sattarasa natthiyā vigate terasa
